analysis.description:
DASCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#348-367) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- crowdsaleBeneficiary.transfer(ethToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#359-363)

DASCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#348-367) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- ethToWithdraw == 0 && dasToWithdraw == 0
	- ethToWithdraw == 0 && dasToWithdraw == 0
emptyMetadata in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#132) is a local variable never initialiazed
emptyMetadata in ERC223Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#148) is a local variable never initialiazed

DASCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#328-341) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-dasToken.transfer(msg.sender,receivedAmount / crowdsaleTokenPriceDenominator * crowdsaleTokenPriceNumerator) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#333-340)

DASCrowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#348-367) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-dasToken.transfer(crowdsaleDasTokensChangeBeneficiary,dasToWithdraw) (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#364-367)

ERC223Token.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#175-188)
	- /unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#180-188

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/21/0xd23abea2946febef30418d19db5e2c93c7abcb1e.sol#44:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
